Having sold almost 40 million albums, guitar hero, wild child, Lenny Kravitz continues his reign as rock ’n’ roll's visceral force with the release of his 10th album, Strut.

Along with the album Lenny Kravitz is releasing its lead single, The Chamber.

And he premieres its video on Telegraph.co.uk. 

Read more and watch the video at:
http://www.telegraph.co.uk/culture/culturevideo/musicvideo/11073617/Lenny-Kravitz-premieres-the-video-for-The-Chamber-online.html
